code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useAuth}from"../hooks/useAuth";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=()=>{const[isScrolled,setIsScrolled]=useState(false);const{isAuthenticated}=useAuth();useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{const scrollTop=window.scrollY;setIsScrolled(scrollTop>0);};window.addEventListener("scroll",handleScroll);return()=>window.removeEventListener("scroll",handleScroll);},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"".concat(isScrolled?"bg-gray-900/70":"bg-gray-900/50"," sticky top-0 z-50 transition-colors duration-300"),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"max-w-6xl mx-auto flex flex-col md:flex-row justify-end items-center px-4 md:px-0 py-3 md:py-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex gap-4 md:gap-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"no-underline px-3 md:px-4 py-2 hover:bg-white/20 transition-colors",children:"Top"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/works",className:"no-underline px-3 md:px-4 py-2 hover:bg-white/20 transition-colors",children:"Works"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",className:"no-underline px-3 md:px-4 py-2 hover:bg-white/20 transition-colors",children:"About"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/blog",className:"no-underline px-3 md:px-4 py-2 hover:bg-white/20 transition-colors",children:"Blog"}),isAuthenticated&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/admin",className:"no-underline px-3 md:px-4 py-2 hover:bg-white/20 transition-colors",children:"Admin"})]})})});};export default Header;
